title: Chicken liver pâté
ingredients: ['250g chicken livers, (thawed if bought frozen), trimmed, washed and drained', '150ml red wine', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '2 tsp chopped fresh thyme generous pinch of ground nutmeg', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 tsp powdered gelatine', '50g butter', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', 'small sprigs of fresh thyme to garnish']
